attributes.action: change the name of ve day to peace day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that we should commemorate peace not victory . Peace which cost the lives of millions of soldiers and should be valued .
 I think we need to be reminded of the value of peace not the value of victory .  I think we should be magnaminous in victory and regard the true victory as attaining peace not beating our competetor or enemy ! Vitriol tends to grate on peoples' nerves and alienates as opposed to unite groups .
 July the 4th gets on my nerves as does Zimbabwe's heroes day , I think its silly to be reminded that you were beaten in a war 250 yrs ago but we are just as guilty of it if we keep saying we beat the Germans twice , once in 1966 and in 1945 and celebrate a VE day  ! What was the victory, beating the Germans or regaining the peace we lost ?
Perhaps if we change the name of ve day to peace day other countries may follow suit and we could start a movement, a movement towards peace ?
Competetion is not a dirty word but maybe we can compete to be the most peaceful nation ? 
Jonathan Mountain
